verses.verse: And he said <WH559> <WH8804> unto Mosheh <WH4872>, Come up <WH5927> <WH8798> unto the YY <WH3068>, thou, and Aharon <WH175>, Nadav <WH5070>, and Abihu <WH30>, and seventy <WH7657> of the elders <WH2205> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>; and worship <WH7812> <WH8694> ye afar off <WH7350>.
And Mosheh <WH4872> alone shall come near <WH5066> <WH8738> the YY <WH3068>: but they shall not come nigh <WH5066> <WH8799>; neither shall the people <WH5971> go up <WH5927> <WH8799> with him.

And Mosheh <WH4872> came <WH935> <WH8799> and told <WH5608> <WH8762> the people <WH5971> all the words <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068>, and all the judgments <WH4941>: and all the people <WH5971> answered <WH6030> <WH8799> with one <WH259> voice <WH6963>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, All the words <WH1697> which the YY <WH3068> hath said <WH1696> <WH8765> will we do <WH6213> <WH8799>.

And Mosheh <WH4872> wrote <WH3789> <WH8799> all the words <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068>, and rose up early <WH7925> <WH8686> in the morning <WH1242>, and builded <WH1129> <WH8799> an altar <WH4196> under the hill <WH2022>, and twelve pillars <WH4676>, according to the twelve <WH8147> <WH6240> tribes <WH7626> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>.

And he sent <WH7971> <WH8799> young men <WH5288> of the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, which offered <WH5927> <WH8686> burnt offerings <WH5930>, and sacrificed <WH2076> <WH8799> peace <WH8002> offerings <WH2077> of oxen <WH6499> unto the YY <WH3068>.

And Mosheh <WH4872> took <WH3947> <WH8799> half <WH2677> of the blood <WH1818>, and put <WH7760> <WH8799> it in basons <WH101>; and half <WH2677> of the blood <WH1818> he sprinkled <WH2236> <WH8804> on the altar <WH4196>.

And he took <WH3947> <WH8799> the book <WH5612> of the covenant <WH1285>, and read <WH7121> <WH8799> in the audience <WH241> of the people <WH5971>: and they said <WH559> <WH8799>, All that the YY <WH3068> hath said <WH1696> <WH8765> will we do <WH6213> <WH8799>, and be `Ovedient <WH8085> <WH8799>.

And Mosheh <WH4872> took <WH3947> <WH8799> the blood <WH1818>, and sprinkled <WH2236> <WH8799> it on the people <WH5971>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, Behold the blood <WH1818> of the covenant <WH1285>, which the YY <WH3068> hath made <WH3772> <WH8804> with you concerning all these words <WH1697>.
Then went up <WH5927> <WH8799> Mosheh <WH4872>, and Aharon <WH175>, Nadav <WH5070>, and Abihu <WH30>, and seventy <WH7657> of the elders <WH2205> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>:

And they saw <WH7200> <WH8799> the 'Elohim <WH430> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>: and there was under his feet <WH7272> as it were a paved <WH3840> work <WH4639> of a sapphire stone <WH5601>, and as it were the body <WH6106> of heaven <WH8064> in his clearness <WH2892>.

And upon the nobles <WH678> of the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> he laid <WH7971> <WH8804> not his hand <WH3027>: also they saw <WH2372> <WH8799> 'Elohim <WH430>, and did eat <WH398> <WH8799> and drink <WH8354> <WH8799>.

And the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Mosheh <WH4872>, Come up <WH5927> <WH8798> to me into the mount <WH2022>, and be there: and I will give <WH5414> <WH8799> thee tables <WH3871> of stone <WH68>, and a Torah <WH8451>, and Mitzvot <WH4687> which I have written <WH3789> <WH8804>; that thou mayest teach <WH3384> <WH8687> them.
And Mosheh <WH4872> rose up <WH6965> <WH8799>, and his minister <WH8334> <WH8764> Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091>: and Mosheh <WH4872> went up <WH5927> <WH8799> into the mount <WH2022> of 'Elohim <WH430>.

And he said <WH559> <WH8804> unto the elders <WH2205>, Tarry <WH3427> <WH8798> ye here <WH2088> for us, until we come again <WH7725> <WH8799> unto you: and, behold, Aharon <WH175> and Hur <WH2354> are with you: if any <WH4310> man <WH1167> have any matters <WH1697> to do <WH1167>, let him come <WH5066> <WH8799> unto them.
And Mosheh <WH4872> went up <WH5927> <WH8799> into the mount <WH2022>, and a cloud <WH6051> covered <WH3680> <WH8762> the mount <WH2022>.

And the glory <WH3519> of the YY <WH3068> abode <WH7931> <WH8799> upon mount <WH2022> Sinai <WH5514>, and the cloud <WH6051> covered <WH3680> <WH8762> it six <WH8337> days <WH3117>: and the seventh <WH7637> day <WH3117> he called <WH7121> <WH8799> unto Mosheh <WH4872> out of the midst <WH8432> of the cloud <WH6051>.

And the sight <WH4758> of the glory <WH3519> of the YY <WH3068> was like devouring <WH398> <WH8802> fire <WH784> on the top <WH7218> of the mount <WH2022> in the eyes <WH5869> of the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>.

And Mosheh <WH4872> went <WH935> <WH8799> into the midst <WH8432> of the cloud <WH6051>, and gat him up <WH5927> <WH8799> into the mount <WH2022>: and Mosheh <WH4872> was in the mount <WH2022> forty <WH705> days <WH3117> and forty <WH705> nights <WH3915>.
